indian.name: Butter Paneer

indian.name: Garlic naan
indian.desc: Soft, fluffy Indian bread topped with fresh garlic and butter.

chinese.desc: Classic Indo-Chinese stir-fried noodles with a variety of vegetables.

chinese.desc: Deep-fried vegetable balls in a savory, sweet, and tangy sauce.

chinese.name: Chilli Paneer Dry

chinese.name: Spring Rolls
chinese.desc: Crispy fried rolls filled with a savory vegetable stuffing.
